Responsibilities:  
 Prepared insurance documents (policy documents, certificates, endorsements, schedule, 
invoice)  
 Reviewed new and renewal business requests in order to determine insurability based on 
corporate guidelines and standards  
 
 11 months’ Medical insurance underwriter.  
 
Responsibilities:  
 Prepare quotation for group & individual medical.  
 Prepare quotations on new and renewal business  
 Follow up on renewal policies to ensure the renewals are done timely.  
 Collecting accurate information & documents to proceed with a claim  
 
 Good working knowl edge of Computer (Microsoft Office, Internet and typing).  
 Aware of different calculation in excel sheet that is needed for underwriting.  
 Excellent in dealing and communicating with others.  
 Good Math’s skills.  
 Quick learner.  
 Work under pressure.   
 
 
 Arabic – native language
